definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: rejoice (‖ with [[עָלַז]], [[עָלַץ]], q. v.; NH [[עֲלִיסָה]] rejoicing (once Levy:NHWB iii. 657));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יַעֲלֽס]] Job 20:18 he shall not rejoice.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[נֶעֱלָָסָה]] Job 39:13 (of ostrich's wing) = flap joyously.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. 1 pl. cohort. [[נִתְעַלְּסָה]] Pr 7:18 let us delight ourselves in ([[ב]]) love.
